mapper.select: SELECT DT.id, DT.diary_type, DT.type_name, DT.is_base_diary, IF( DT.is_base_diary = 1, DT.id, DT.base_diary_type_id) base_diary_type_id , GROUP_CONCAT(DR.depend_type) AS user_role_depend_type FROM cd_diary_type DT LEFT JOIN cd_diary_depend_mclass DPM ON DPM.diary_type_id = DT.id AND DPM.depend_mclasscode IN ( SELECT prd_code FROM green_house GH INNER JOIN green_house_product GHP ON GH.id = GHP.green_house_id WHERE (#{houseId} IS NULL OR GH.id = #{houseId} ) AND GH.gsm_key = #{gsmKey} ) LEFT JOIN cd_diary_depend_role DR ON DR.diary_type_id = DT.id LEFT JOIN user_info_roles UIR ON UIR.roles_id = DR.depend_role_id AND UIR.user_idx = #{userIdx} WHERE ( DR.depend_type IS NULL OR DR.depend_type != 'DENY' ) AND ( DPM.depend_type IS NULL OR DPM.depend_type != 'DENY' ) AND ( DT.is_base_diary = 1 OR DR.depend_type = 'ACCESS' OR DR.depend_type = 'READ' OR DPM.depend_type = 'ACCESS' ) GROUP BY DT.id, DT.diary_type;
